590a358486f77429692b2790 Description: A compact, high-energy lithium battery commonly used in small electronic devices, tactical devices, and weapon sights. Known for long shelf life and reliable performance under high-drain conditions.
5672cb304bdc2dc2088b456a Description: A small, coin-cell lithium battery commonly used in general electronics like watches, calculators, and key fobs. In military applications, it powers devices such as tactical devices, and military-grade sights, providing reliable, long-lasting energy in a compact form factor.
